title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, June 12, 2021
description: "Readers are plentiful; thinkers are rare." A quote by sociologist and writer Harriet Martineau, born this day in England, 1802.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Readers are plentiful; thinkers are rare." A quote by sociologist and writer Harriet Martineau, born this day in England, 1802.
